question: The webinar between India and Kazakhstan was organized by which Ministry?
explanation:
A webinar between India and Kazakhstan was held recently on the theme - “Make In India For The World, India – Kazakhstan Defence Cooperation: Webinar and Expo”.
The webinar was organized by Department of Defence Production, Ministry of Defence through FICCI. This is a part of the webinar series organized by the Ministry with friendly nations with the aim to boost defence exports.
